title: Task 72

question.text: If a friend tells you, I'm going to attend the new art workshop, what are they planning to do?

answers.answer: They are planning to teach at the art workshop
answers.feedback: Attend suggests participating as a learner or member, not as a teacher.
Attend implies regular or scheduled participation, not a one-time visit.

answers.answer: They are not interested in art workshops
answers.feedback: Saying they will attend indicates interest and intent to participate, not a lack of interest.

answers.answer: They plan to participate in the art workshop

description: The verb attend means to be present at an event or place. It's often used regarding schools, colleges, meetings, or events. It implies regular participation or presence at a specific place or event.
